CustomField.description: How much usage until the next price break kicks in? Example: For every 1000 therms (increment), we give you another 1% (volume discount) off the margin
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How much usage until the next price break kicks in? Example: For every 1000 therms (increment), we give you another 1% (volume discount) off the margin
CustomField.label: Volume Discount
